title: Urgent search for phony 'Bitcoin billionaire' wanted in all 50 states after he convinced pal to pay $50K bond
description: Authorities are now searching for Segal after he used $50,000 a local man, Jason Irvine, gave him to pay up his bond last month but failed to appear in court this week.
